description:
This course is for the beginners through the advanced videographers out there.

This course covers all the details most people don't even know about there cameras! Such as which settings should be used, and which should be turned off.

Students will also learn extremely important camera techniques, including: ISO - APERTURE - SHUTTER SPEED - WHITE BALANCE AND MUCH MORE!

As you watch the course, I give you real life examples of the different settings you can use and the impact it makes on your movie!

If you are wondering if you have what it takes to be a cinematographer, or if you want to know your camera fully inside and out, this is the course for you!

If you want to know everything you will learn in a basic film class, here it is for so much cheaper than anywhere else!

You'll also be able to take the quiz and find out if you were paying attention during the videos!

I am a film student, transferring to Chapman Film University next semester. My credits include...

Disney Channel

FX

MTV

CBS

And Much More! You can check out my IMDb for the complete list!

It doesn't matter what kind of videographer you are, someone who loves Short Films, Commercials, Movies, TV Shows, Documentaries, whatever it may be, you can use these cinematography skills and techniques to expand your career!
title: Cinematography - Professionally Use & Understand Your DSLR
